>
[Beast Trainer](/Feats.aspx?ID=1283) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 18 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have an impressive innate ability to tame and command ferocious beasts. You become trained in the [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) skill and gain the [Train Animal](/Feats.aspx?ID=856) skill feat.

<title level="2">Beast Trainer leads to...</title>
[Dragon Grip](/Feats.aspx?ID=2420), [Ferocious Beasts](/Feats.aspx?ID=1292)
